imdb.plot outline: Comedian Justin Michaels thinks he's gotten his big break to host a late night TV talk show. Turns out, his talent agent has duped him, signing him to a seven-year contract to host a classic TV clip show instead. Hating the show and the fact that he's been duped, Justin plots to either get the show canceled or get himself fired. But the harder he tries to do either, the worse his situation gets.
imdb.title: Yesterland Waltz
plot: Comedian Justin Michaels thinks he's gotten his big break to host a late night TV talk show. Turns out, his talent agent has duped him, signing him to a seven-year contract to host a classic TV clip show instead. Hating the show and the fact that he's been duped, Justin plots to either get the show canceled or get himself fired. But the harder he tries to do either, the worse his situation gets.

Justin Michaels thinks he's gotten his big break to host his very own late night TV talk show. But instead, he's been conned by his talent agent to host a classic TV clip show called "_Yesterland Waltz_ (qv)," a show he hates. So he launches a string of schemes to get himself fired or get the show canceled.
